China, 2000
director & screenplay: Lou Ye
cinematography: Wang Yu
editor: Karl Riedl
design: Naomi Shohan ; Li Zhouyi
music: Jorg Lemberg
producer: Philippe Bober
production co.: Dream Factory ; Essential Filmproduktion ; The Coproduction Office
cast: 

Zhou Xun ... Meimei / Moudan
Jia Hongsheng ... Mardar
Yao Anlian
Nai An ... Xia Ho

The Skinny:	 
Often referred to as the "Chinese Vertigo," Suzhou River is a gritty neo-noir from the mind of writer/director Lou Ye that has just enough twists and turns to stand apart from Hitchcock's preceding film.
